dialogue:
Hello loser
What's up meme dweeb
touch grass
kermit.description:
He's a puppet like little fellow, seems pretty tired. Some liquid energy might do him some good.
But that's not my business.

dialogue:
Everything's fine...
I mean but did you die?
Yep I'm in my safe zone.
doge.description:
He looks like a more espresso less depresso kind of doge, pretty calm for this chaos.
Might be a load off if these flames were to be put out.

dialogue:
I tried to be happy, it was terrible
fun? never heard of it
ayooooo
grumpycat.description: The grumpiest of cats, if only there was something in the universe to bring him joy.

dialogue: One does not simply learn a new language without learning the bad words first
One does not simply meme like an edgelord
One does not simply walk 500 miles without walking 500 more
boromir.description: He looks quite kingly, although he is the son of a steward you presume he aspires to be king.

dialogue:
Smeagol promises to Precious, promises faithfully. Never come again, never speak, no never!
Smeagol will swear on the Precious.
‘Stew the rabbits!’ squealed Gollum in dismay. ‘Spoil beautiful meat Smeagol saved for you, poor hungry Smeagol!
gollum.description: You look into his eyes and only see pencil dots for pupils

dialogue:
Stew the rabbits!
Curse the Baggins! It’s gone!
Precious, precious, precious!
smeagol.description: You look into his eyes and see huge pupils
